Legitimately the greatest game I have ever played. You don't need to like puzzles to like this game, as it's unique gameplay mechanics and amazing story make this game a great game for everyone. The banter between characters paired with the phenomenal, interactive soundtrack just blows you away. It's a really fun, casual game, and every person should own a copy.
